alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 2:34PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hendry and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 315 PM EST... At 233 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, or 16 miles southeast of Montura, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Okeelanta, and Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
